data.title: SMOKE AND BLUE IN THE FACE
data.meta_description: Miramax/Hyperion, 1995. F. Soft cover. Item #001221 ISBN: 0786880988 A fine and tight softcover first edition. SIGNED BY AUSTER on the title page. Review copy with material laid in. Two films written by Auster. Pictorial cover of Harvey Keitel.
data.text:
Miramax/Hyperion, 1995. F. Soft cover. Item #001221

ISBN: 0786880988

A fine and tight softcover first edition. SIGNED BY AUSTER on the title page. Review copy with material laid in. Two films written by Auster. Pictorial cover of Harvey Keitel.
